about_the_game:
Agarest 2 - DLC Bundle #4


Additional Massage Costumes
Here is some truly titillating attire for a lovely lady to wear while receiving a sensuous massage! Get someone to put this on... NOW!

Additional Bath Costumes
Here is something for one of the lovely ladies in your life to bathe in! Why not get one of them to put it on now?!

Bonus Point Pack 8
Thank you once again for your profligate spending habits. Today we have prepared a heaping helping of party points just for you.
Included points: 6,500PP
These points can be shared amongst your entire party. Spread the wealth, create a single superhero, or shower them upon a beloved character; it's entirely up to you.
detailed_description:
Agarest 2 - DLC Bundle #4


Additional Massage Costumes
Here is some truly titillating attire for a lovely lady to wear while receiving a sensuous massage! Get someone to put this on... NOW!

Additional Bath Costumes
Here is something for one of the lovely ladies in your life to bathe in! Why not get one of them to put it on now?!

Bonus Point Pack 8
Thank you once again for your profligate spending habits. Today we have prepared a heaping helping of party points just for you.
Included points: 6,500PP
These points can be shared amongst your entire party. Spread the wealth, create a single superhero, or shower them upon a beloved character; it's entirely up to you.

name: Agarest 2 - Bundle #5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 64Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 128Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: Agarest 2 - DLC Bundle #4Additional Massage Costumes, Additional Bath Costumes, Bonus Point Pack 8
